Head.title: Downloads
Head.desc: DeFiChain mobile app, CLI and desktop app downloads for macOS, Windows and Linux.

Header.title: Downloads
Header.desc: Download applications for mobile, macOS, Windows and Linux.

DFC.title: DeFiChain wallet mobile app
DFC.desc: Lightweight, instant access to Decentralized Finance for Bitcoin, at your fingertips.

saiive.title: saiive.live mobile wallet
saiive.desc: A non-custodial light wallet for DeFiChain from and for the community.

DFX.title: DFX wallet mobile app
DFX.desc: Store, receive and send DeFiChain tokens with utmost simplicity and security uncomplicated from your mobile.

DFC.title: DeFi Wallet desktop app
DFC.desc: Transact, liquidity mine, swap and more with the full-featured and fully-decentralized wallet app. Full node included.

saiive.title: saiive.live desktop wallet
saiive.desc: A non-custodial desktop wallet for DeFiChain from and for the community.

RPI.title: DeFi wallet for Raspberry Pi
RPI.desc: A version of the desktop wallet for Raspberry Pi 4B 4GB with official Raspberry Pi OS (32-Bit).

CLI.title: CLI
CLI.desc: Transact and interact with DeFiChain through a command line interface. Full node included.
